= Tips and Tricks =
 # aliases are fun.. vi ~/.profile (or .bashrc):
{{{
alias ci1='cif -c ~/.cif1'
alias ci2='cif -c ~/.cif2'
alias cif_snort='cif1 -p snort'
alias feed_suspicious_networks='cif -q infrastructure/network -p snort'
}}}
